Original:
土城的島嶼事務所，一個充滿懷舊氣息和獨特收藏的場所，無論是其裝潢風格還是內部設施，都讓人感到別具一格。一進門，映入眼簾的是各式各樣的有趣收藏，彷彿進入了時間的隧道，將人帶回到那個充滿舊時光味道的年代。進入這裡，需要換上店家提供的拖鞋，這個小小的儀式感，讓人感到特別，也讓人更能放鬆心情，享受接下來的時光。

一樓的空間佈置充滿了創意和懷舊情懷。老台式的床框被改造成小座位區，讓人感覺像是在家裡的床邊小憩。而那一人使用的老理髮椅，也被巧妙地變成了座位，這些充滿故事的老物件，讓人坐下來的同時，也不禁開始回憶起那些遙遠的過往。此外，還有一個映像管電視的座位區，彷彿帶著人們回到了那個用老電視觀看節目的時代。

這次來到島嶼事務所，我點了一杯蔓越莓汁，價格150元。在這個舒適的環境中，捧著一本書，靜靜地閱讀，彷彿外面的世界都與我無關。隨著時間的推移，我竟然在這個安靜的角落裡不知不覺地睡著了。這是一個颱風來臨之前的夜晚，外面或許已經開始變天，但在這裡，卻是一片寧靜祥和。

地下室更是別有洞天，設有電影室和麻將桌特別包廂。這樣的設計，無疑讓這個地方成為了朋友聚會和家庭活動的好去處。電影室讓人可以享受一場的電影時光，而麻將桌特別包廂，則滿足了人們在這裡娛樂的需求。

島嶼事務所的每一個角落，都充滿了店主的用心。那些看似隨意擺放的收藏品，其實都蘊含著深厚的文化底蘊和故事。這裡的每一件物品，彷彿都有一段屬於它自己的歷史，而這些歷史，通過這些物件，緩緩地訴說給每一位來訪的客人。

在這裡度過的時間，是一種心靈的放鬆和精神的愉悅。無論是獨自一人，還是與朋友家人一同前來，島嶼事務所都能夠提供一個溫暖而舒適的環境，讓人們忘卻都市的喧囂，享受片刻的寧靜。

土城的島嶼事務所，不僅僅是一個咖啡店，更是一個充滿故事和情感的場所。在這裡，每一位客人都能找到屬於自己的那份感動和回憶。在颱風來臨之前的這個夜晚，我在這裡度過了一段悠閒的時光，感受到了那份難得的寧靜與安逸。
EN:
Tucheng's island firm, a place full of nostalgia and unique collection, is unique in the decoration style or internal facilities.As soon as you enter the door, you can see all kinds of interesting collections, as if entering the tunnel of time, bringing people back to the era full of old times.Entering here, you need to change to the slippers provided by the store. This small sense of ritual makes people feel special and makes people more relaxed and enjoyed the next time.

The space layout on the first floor is full of creativity and nostalgia.The old -style bed frame was transformed into a small seat area, making people feel like taking a rest by the bed at home.The old man used by that person was also cleverly turned into a seat. These old objects full of stories made people sit down and could not help but start to remember those distant pasts.In addition, there is a seat area with an image tube TV, which seems to bring people back to the era of watching the show with old TV.

When I came to the island office this time, I ordered a cup of cranberry juice at 150 yuan.In this comfortable environment, holding a book and reading quietly, as if the outside world has nothing to do with me.Over time, I fell asleep unconsciously in this quiet corner.This is the night before a typhoon, maybe it may have begun to change outside, but here, it is quiet and peaceful.

The basement is unique, and there are special boxes in film rooms and mahjong tables.This design undoubtedly makes this place a good place for friends gatherings and family activities.The film room allows people to enjoy a movie time, and the special box of Mahjong table meets the needs of people's entertainment.

Every corner of the island office is full of intentions of the owner.Those seemingly arbitrary collectibles actually contain deep cultural heritage and stories.Every item here seems to have a history that belongs to its own, and these history, through these objects, slowly tell each visiting guest.

The time to spend here is a kind of relaxation of the soul and the joy of spirit.Whether it is alone or with friends and family, the island office can provide a warm and comfortable environment, making people forget the hustle and bustle of the city, and enjoy a moment of tranquility.

Tucheng's island office is not only a coffee shop, but also a place full of stories and emotions.Here, every guest can find his own movement and memory.This night before the typhoon came, I spent a leisurely time here, feeling the rare tranquility and comfort.
